set(LOGGER_SRC
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src/logger.c
)

if (DEFINED SEMIHOSTING)
	set(LOGGER_SRC
		${LOGGER_SRC}
		${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src/logger-stdio.c
	)
endif()

set(LOGGER_NATIVE_SRC
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src/logger.c
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src/logger-stdio.c
	PARENT_SCOPE
)

set(LOGGER_SRC
	${LOGGER_SRC}
	PARENT_SCOPE
)
